name: Fist of Heroes
description:
You have to dispose of zombies coming from four directions.
Horrorable zombies approaching to center, you have to kick or punch them in exact time.

​• Gameplay
- You can play more fun with rhythmical.
- Careful blind spot while you attack with dragging gesture.
- Gather combos to use ultimate skill.
- Swipe to direction of approaching zombie.
- Extra fever mode.

​• Features
- Cute 10 heroes who have various skills.
- Easy controls to understand.
- Achievements.
- In game community to interact other players.
